history.narrative: Law 2-120 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 2-304, which was referred to the Committee on Public Services and Consumer Affairs. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 27, 1978, and July 11, 1978, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on August 2, 1978, it was assigned Act No. 2-250 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
